quick_wins.title: Automate Invoice Processing
quick_wins.description: Implement Power Automate flow to automatically extract data from invoices and populate accounting system, eliminating manual data entry.

quick_wins.title: Create Self-Service IT Portal
quick_wins.description: Build a SharePoint site with Power Apps forms for common IT requests, reducing helpdesk tickets by 40%.

quick_wins.title: Dashboard for Real-Time Inventory
quick_wins.description: Use Power BI to create live inventory dashboard connecting to existing ERP, providing instant visibility across warehouses.

priority_matrix.current_state: Your organization operates at a developing digital maturity level with strong foundational systems but opportunities for automation and AI integration.
priority_matrix.key_opportunity: Leverage existing Microsoft 365 ecosystem to create citizen-led automation solutions that address top operational bottlenecks.
priority_matrix.recommended_starting_point: Begin with invoice processing automation - it offers immediate ROI and builds team confidence in low-code tools.
